description: This table contains information about a claim's claim-level adjustments. These adjustments are on top of service line amounts, so they don't factor into patient portion / benefits but are subject to interest and penalties. These amounts affect the total payment of the claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CLAIM_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The monetary claim-level adjustment amount for a claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_ADJ_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Claim Level Adjustment Reason category ID for the claim.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
